name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Experienced Senior SREngineer with 8 years in incident management, monitoring systems, and DevOps practices, specializing in cloud services like **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**. Proficient in containerization and orchestration technologies including **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, I effectively deploy and manage scalable applications. My programming expertise extends across **Java**, **Spring Boot**, and scripting languages, ensuring robust automated solutions and CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub**, **GitLab**, **Azure DevOps**, and **Jenkins**.

I leverage monitoring tools such as **Datadog**, **New Relic**, **Dynatrace**, **Prometheus**, and **Grafana** to optimize system performance and ensure high availability. My leadership and mentoring skills foster effective team collaboration, driving continuous improvement in service reliability and responsiveness. My technical acumen is complemented by hands-on experience in full-stack development with **React**, **Node.js**, and **Python**, as well as implementing MLOps workflows with **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. With a foundational understanding of compliance standards, I build secure, enterprise-grade platforms that meet critical industry regulations.
